subtitle: A simple quick and tasty main meal packed full of flavour and textures.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Place a small roasting tray on the hob over a medium heat and melt the butter. Add the pork fillets, garlic slices, red chillies, red pepper slices and onion. Cook for approximately 10 min or until meat is well browned on both sides. Season.
Remove the pork fillets from the roasting tin and add the bean sprouts to the onion and chilli mixture and cook for 1 min on the hob over a medium heat.

Meanwhile carve the pork fillets into thin slices and divide equally between the pancakes only covering half of each pancake. Arrange the onion and chilli mixture on the meat and fold the other pancake half over the top. Serve immediately.

title: Pancakes with roasted pork fillets, chillies and beansprouts
